title: Historical Event Participants Schema
description: Information about the individuals, organizations, and factions involved in a historical event.

role.description: The function or position this individual held during the event.

significance.description: How this individual's actions influenced the course or outcome of the event.

key_figures.description: The principal individuals whose actions directly shaped the event's course and outcome.

involvement.description: The nature and extent of this organization's participation in the event.

organizations.description: Collective entities that participated in or were affected by the event.
